name: Dominance, a Civilization inspired strategy game (PC/Tablet)
blurb: Dominance is a new strategy based game along the lines of Civilization for PC, Android and iOS featuring lots of new features.

rewards.reward: An easy way to just show your support regardless of your budget. Every pound is very gratefully received. :-)
Copy of the full game on your platform of choice upon completion, with access to the beta on that same platform.
Copy of the full game on all supported platforms upon completion, with access to the beta on each platform also.

Copy of the full game on all platforms upon completion, with immediate access to the alpha build so that you can help to directly influence the development of the game in its earliest stages and suggest changes before anything is finalized.

Copy of the full game on all platforms upon completion, with immediate access to the alpha build so that you can help to directly influence the development of the game in its earliest stages and suggest changes before anything is finalized. In addition, anyone who pledges \u00a320.00 or more will get early access to the space continuation of the game as soon as a beta is ready (this will take the form of a paid add on for tablets, and DLC on the PC/MAC for non kickstarter supporters) and full access upon its release without having to pay the additional content charge.

The T-Shirt pledge. Anyone who chooses this pledge will get a choice of one T-Shirt from the designs illustrated, in either black or white. Available in any size, which will be requested before dispatch. Also includes a full copy of the game on all available platforms, including immediate access to the alpha builds, and the full space expansion including beta when it is available.\r\n\r\nThese are not sold separately anywhere else so this kickstarter is the only place to get one.

Design 1 unit, 1 building and 1 technology for the game, with the option to submit your own graphics for each to be used in the final release, with design credits. Also includes a copy of the game on each platform, immediate access to the alpha, and access to all beta builds, including the space expansion when available.

The map builders pledge.\r\n\r\nDesign a map using the beta and have it included with the game as one of five playable alternate maps with design credits. On top of this, a copy of the game on every platform, and immediate access to the alpha builds and future access to the beta builds including the space expansion.

Option to have a photo of yourself used as a base for the avatar of another civilization within the game, with credits. Your face in the game forever! Also includes a copy of the game on each platform, immediate access to the alpha, and access to all beta builds including the space expansion.

The ultimate designer pledge. Take full control for a map variant within the finished game. You'll design everything - you determine the ground types, decorations, units, technologies, and text descriptions - I do the work. All your content will be produced and added to the game as an alternate playable scenario with full, highlighted design credits given to you. Also gives a copy of the game on all platforms, access to beta builds including the space expansion, and immediate access to the alpha.
